name: PO-P-rotect
description:
POPULATE AND PROTECT THE BALLS.

Controls:

Use left click to place blocks.

Use right click to rotate blocks.

Collect coins and use it to unlock special blocks.

Num1 Key - Default block

Num2 Key - Time block

Num3 Key - Slow block

Feel free to report bugs and give us suggestions on what we could update the game with!

Music credits: Timecop 1983 - On the Run
